##  Corporate 

#  Corporate 

## ABOUT

BRP Inc. is a global leader in the world of powersports products, propulsion systems and boats built on over 80 years of ingenuity and intensive consumer focus. Through its portfolio of industry-leading and distinctive brands featuring Ski-Doo and Lynx snowmobiles, Sea-Doo watercraft and pontoons, Can-Am on and off-road vehicles, Alumacraft and Quintrex boats, Manitou pontoons and Rotax marine propulsion systems as well as Rotax engines for karts and recreational aircraft, BRP unlocks exhilarating adventures and provides access to experiences across different playgrounds. The Company completes its lines of products with a dedicated parts, accessories and apparel portfolio to fully optimize the riding experience. Committed to growing responsibly, BRP is developing electric models for its existing product lines and exploring new low voltage and human assisted product categories. Headquartered in Quebec, Canada, BRP has annual sales of CA$10 billion from over 130 countries and a global workforce of close to 23,000 driven, resourceful people.

[MORE](https://www.brp.com/en/about-brp.html)

##  Press Kits 

#  Press Kits 

[![BRP](/system/files-encrypted/nasdaq_kms/inline-images/450x450_VBIAssets_RYK_600_2UP_BLACK_STATIC_LIFESTYLE_MY19_AB_B42I3095_BW_300-medium.jpg) ](/newsroom)

## BRP

Headquartered in Quebec, Canada, BRP has sales in over 130 countries and a global workforce of close to 23,000 driven, resourceful people reimagining the way you access your world.

[BRP NEWSROOM ](/newsroom)

[![Sea Doo](/system/files-encrypted/nasdaq_kms/inline-images/Sea-Doo.jpg) ](/newsroom/our-brands/sea-doo)

## Sea-Doo

Our first adventure in the world of water. There's one for every kind of fun you can imagine, from power sports or gentle rides, to pickinicking on the open water or a fishing trip.

[SEA-DOO NEWSROOM ](/newsroom/our-brands/sea-doo)

[![Ski-Doo](/system/files-encrypted/nasdaq_kms/inline-images/Ski-Doo.jpg) ](/newsroom/our-brands/ski-doo)

## Ski-Doo

Our first "first" remains the reference for the industry. It created a new sport and enabled people to access winter mountains and snowy plains in a whole new way. And we're still leading the pack.

[SKI-DOO NEWSROOM ](/newsroom/our-brands/ski-doo)

[![Lynx](/system/files-encrypted/nasdaq_kms/inline-images/Lynx.jpg) ](/newsroom/our-brands/lynx)

## Lynx

Manufactured and tested north of 66° 33′ 44″ N, our Scandinavian snowmobiles are made to withstand the harshest winter conditions and roughest rides..

[LYNX NEWSROOM](/newsroom/our-brands/lynx)

[![Can-Am On-Road](/system/files-encrypted/nasdaq_kms/inline-images/On-Road.jpg) ](/newsroom/our-brands/can-am-on-road)

## Can-Am On-Road

Another first, bringing the exhilaration of the open road to everyone. Our non-traditional three-wheeled vehicles are a ride like no other, on paved or unpaved roads, or highways.

[CAN-AM ON-ROAD NEWSROOM ](/newsroom/our-brands/can-am-on-road)

[![Can-Am Off-Road](/system/files-encrypted/nasdaq_kms/inline-images/Off_Road_450.png) ](/newsroom/our-brands/can-am-off-road)

## Can-Am Off-Road

Whatever the terrain, whatever the conditions; for fun, for work; alone or together. We've built them for high performance and easy handling to make every trail accessible.

[CAN-AM OFF-ROAD NEWSROOM ](/newsroom/our-brands/can-am-off-road)

[![Can-Am Motorcycles](/system/files-encrypted/nasdaq_kms/inline-images/Motorcycle_450_0.png) ](/newsroom/our-brands/can-am-motorcycles)

## Can-Am Motorcycles

The first Can-Am motorcycle was introduced in 1973 and immediately reigned over motocross and endurance racing. To mark the 50th anniversary of the beloved Can-Am brand, BRP is launching a family of electric 2-wheel motorcycles.

[Can-Am Motorcycles NEWSROOM ](/newsroom/our-brands/can-am-motorcycles)

[![Manitou](/system/files-encrypted/nasdaq_kms/inline-images/Manitou_450.png) ](/newsroom/our-brands/manitou)

## Manitou

We don't just make boats, we make waves. An incredible combination of high performance and high style, built with passion and precision, for the lifestyle you lead.

[MANITOU NEWSROOM ](https://marinemarketinghub.com/UserContentStart.aspx?category=1)

[![Alumacraft](/system/files-encrypted/nasdaq_kms/inline-images/Alumacraft_450.png) ](/newsroom/our-brands/alumacraft)

## Alumacraft

A boat that stays in the family for generations. A memory-making machine. A quality that builds trust that lasts forever. For everyone that enjoys the peace and exhilaration of an afternoon on the water.

[ALUMACRAFT NEWSROOM ](https://marinemarketinghub.com/UserContentStart.aspx?category=1)

[![Rotax](/system/files-encrypted/nasdaq_kms/inline-images/Rotax.jpg) ](/newsroom/our-brands/rotax)

## Rotax

Since our first Ski-Doo snowmobile, a Rotax powertrain has been at the heart of every BRP vehicle, powering the ultimate ride. Their eco-friendly technologies also provide dynamic performance for karts and aircraft.

[ROTAX NEWSROOM](/newsroom/our-brands/rotax)
